home.title: Home
home.introduction: Hello, I'm Andrew López Herrera. I'm a Computer Engineering student at the Limón Academic Center of the Costa Rica Institute of Technology. This is a professional portfolio designed to showcase my academic and professional activities. Here you will find both technical and soft skills, as well as personal and academic projects.

presentation.title: Biography
presentation.name: Andrew López Herrera
presentation.biography: I am a Computer Engineering student currently studying at the Limón Academic Center of the Costa Rica Institute of Technology. I really like the career I am pursuing; I have always had an affinity for computers, so I didn't hesitate much when entering this field. I consider myself a person who easily adapts to changes, so working in different teams is not a problem for me. Additionally, I am very interested in topics such as compilers and interpreters, artificial intelligence, robotics, and cybersecurity. I tend to lead my teammates to achieve a common goal, although I have no problem having a good leader who also guides me towards an objective.

programmingWorkshop.title: Taller de Programación
programmingWorkshop.description: Certificate for having tutored the Programming Workshop course, taught at the Limón Academic Center of the Costa Rica Institute of Technology during the first semester of 2023.

introductionToProgramming.title: Introducción a la Programación
introductionToProgramming.description: Certificate for having tutored the Introducción a la Programación course, taught at the Limón Academic Center of the Costa Rica Institute of Technology during the first semester of 2023.

computingElements.title: Elementos de Computación
computingElements.description: Certificate for having tutored the Elementos de Computación course, taught at the Limón Academic Center of the Costa Rica Institute of Technology during the first semester of 2024.

attentionToEmotionalAndAcademicNeeds.title: Atención a las Necesidades Emocionales y Académicas
attentionToEmotionalAndAcademicNeeds.description: Certificate for having participated in the training "Attention to Emotional and Academic Needs," taught at the Costa Rica Institute of Technology.

LinkedIn.description: Connect with me on LinkedIn to explore professional opportunities and share knowledge.

GitHub.description: Visit my GitHub profile to see my projects and contributions to open source.

technicalInterests.title: Technical Interests
list: Robotics in the medical field to improve patient care.
Creating programming languages as a way to preserve indigenous languages.
Artificial intelligence as a tool for finding turtle nests for preservation.
Internet of Things to automate home processes and provide real-time information, such as weather updates for laundry.

computingArchitecture.name: Arquitectura de Computadores
computingArchitecture.description: Course that studies the architecture and organization of computers, including topics such as data representation, instruction set, processor architecture, memory, and input/output systems.

projects.name: Simulador de Arquitectura de Computadores
projects.description: Simulator developed in C++ that allows users to visualize and understand the functioning of a simple computer architecture, including instruction execution, memory management, and input/output operations.

dataStructure.name: Estructuras de Datos
dataStructure.description: Course covering the fundamental concepts of data structures, including lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs, as well as algorithms to manipulate these structures.

projects.name: Librería XML
projects.description: C++ library to manipulate XML files, including functions to read and modify XML in memory. It also supports creating self-balancing binary trees (AVL).

projects.name: Graph Viewer
projects.description: Desktop application to visualize graphs and adjacency matrices. It allows loading graphs from text files, creating graphs, and displaying them graphically.

compilersAndInterpreters.name: Compiladores e Intérpretes
compilersAndInterpreters.description: Course introducing the fundamental concepts and techniques for the design and implementation of compilers and interpreters, including lexical analysis, syntactic analysis, and code generation.

projects.name: OLIAC Compiler
projects.description: OLIAC is a programming language invented in the Compilers and Interpreters course. The compiler is implemented in Java using JavaCup and generates code in MIPS assembly language.

operatingSystemsPrinciples.name: Principios de Sistemas Operativos
operatingSystemsPrinciples.description: Course covering the fundamental principles and concepts of operating systems, including process management, memory management, file systems, and security.

projects.name: Process Scheduling Simulator
projects.description: Java simulator that implements various process scheduling algorithms, including FIFO, SJF, Round Robin, and Multilevel.

introductionToWebPageDevelopment.name: Introducción al Desarrollo de Páginas Web
introductionToWebPageDevelopment.description: Course introducing the fundamental concepts and technologies for web page development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks.

projects.name: Lab 1 - Research in Markdown
projects.description: Research about the characteristics of modern web development, as well as the tools and technologies currently used for web development. The report must be written in Markdown and include screenshots.

projects.name: Lab 2 - Static Web Page
projects.description: Development of a static web page using HTML. The page should only contain the HTML structure.

projects.name: Lab 3 - Dynamic Web Page
projects.description: The same page from Lab 2, but now using CSS for the design and layout of the page.

projects.name: Lab 4 - Questionnaire
projects.description: A questionnaire created by the professor about the POUR principle, accessibility, and solving a case with sprints had to be answered.

projects.name: Lab 5 - Responsive Web Page
projects.description: The same page from Lab 3, but now using media queries so that the page is responsive.

engineeringSoftwareProject.name: Proyecto de Ingeniería de Software
engineeringSoftwareProject.description: Course where all concepts learned during the degree are applied to develop a complete software project, from planning to implementation and maintenance.

projects.name: SRL GESTOCK
projects.description: Inventory and billing management system developed for the company SRL Technology. The system allows controlling products, clients, and invoices, as well as entering, modifying, and deleting products and invoices.

databasesII.name: Bases de Datos II
databasesII.description: Course covering advanced database concepts, including database design, advanced SQL, transactions, and recovery.

projects.name: Wide World Importers
projects.description: Implementation of the Wide World Importers database, which includes tables, relationships, stored procedures, views, and indexes.
